nodes.text: Muja sauce was a type of sauce made from muja fruits. It was often used for space waffle topping served at Old Jho's Pit Stop, which was one of the favorite desserts of Kanan Jarrus.
Muja sauce was first mentioned in Star Wars: Absolutely Everything You Need to Know, a reference book published in September 4, 2015 as part of Journey to Star Wars: The Force Awakens series.
